detaileddescription.para: This package is a mirror of the string_decoder implementation in Node-core.
Full documentation may be found on the Node.js website.
As of version 1.0.0 string_decoder uses semantic versioning.

sect1.title: Previous versions
sect1.para: Previous version numbers match the versions found in Node core, e.g. 0.10.24 matches Node 0.10.24, likewise 0.11.10 matches Node 0.11.10.

sect1.title: Update
sect1.para: The build/ directory contains a build script that will scrape the source from the nodejs/node repo given a specific Node version.

sect1.title: Streams Working Group
sect1.para: string_decoder is maintained by the Streams Working Group, which oversees the development and maintenance of the Streams API within Node.js. The responsibilities of the Streams Working Group include:

listitem.para: Addressing stream issues on the Node.js issue tracker.
Authoring and editing stream documentation within the Node.js project.
Reviewing changes to stream subclasses within the Node.js project.
Redirecting changes to streams from the Node.js project to this project.
Assisting in the implementation of stream providers within Node.js.
Recommending versions of readable-stream to be included in Node.js.
Messaging about the future of streams to give the community advance notice of changes.
